CustomField.formula: IF( (NOT(ISBLANK(What_was_the_initial_enquiry__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(What_does_the_customer_do__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(How_much_do_they_manufacture__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Who_are_we_talking_to__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(What_are_the_applications_discussed__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(When_did_we_fully_qualify_the_customer__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK( Other_comments_customer__c ))||NOT(ISBLANK( Other_comments_2_customer__c))), '1)Initial enquiry for: '+(What_was_the_initial_enquiry__c +'2)Customer is into: '+What_does_the_customer_do__c+ '3)scale of mfg/repair: '+How_much_do_they_manufacture__c+'4)Designation: '+Who_are_we_talking_to__c+'5)Applications discussed: '+What_are_the_applications_discussed__c+ '6)Qualified on: '+When_did_we_fully_qualify_the_customer__c+'7)Comments: '+Other_comments_customer__c+Other_comments_2_customer__c ), IF((NOT(ISBLANK(Where_are_you_located_city__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Why_Henkel__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Dealing_in_these_brands__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Servicing_these_industrial_hubs__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Industrial_annual_turnover__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Team_strength__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Strong_presence_in_these_industries__c))||NOT(ISBLANK( Other_comments_trader__c))||NOT(ISBLANK( Other_Comments_2_trader__c ))), ('1)Located in: '+Where_are_you_located_city__c+'2)Brands: '+Dealing_in_these_brands__c+ '3)Industrial hubs: '+Servicing_these_industrial_hubs__c+'4)Industries: '+Strong_presence_in_these_industries__c+'5)Ann. sales: '+Industrial_annual_turnover__c+'6)Team strength: '+Team_strength__c+'7)Why Henkel: '+Why_Henkel__c+BR()+'8)Comments: '+ Other_comments_trader__c+Other_Comments_2_trader__c ), '') )
CustomField.label: Research Inputs New
